channel.title: Lincoln County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Lincoln County|Idaho|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: ID-24 East - Paul
item.description: ID-24 east at Paul Jct.

item.title: S 700 E at ID-24
item.description: S 700 E at ID-24 near Dietrich. Use ID-24 west for Shoshone; ID-24 east for Minidoka.

item.title: ID-24 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-24 east. Distance to Dietrich.

item.title: US-93 South at ID-24
item.description: US-93 South at ID-24 in Shoshone. Turn left on ID-24 for Dietrich. Continue south on US-93 for Twin Falls and Wells, Nev.

item.title: US-93 South Approaching ID-24
item.description: US-93 South approaching ID-24 in Shoshone.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-26 East/US-93 North. Distance to Carey, Craters of the Moon, and Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Richfield
item.description: Entering Richfield on US-26 East/US-93 North.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Little Wood River
item.description: Little Wood River bridge on US-26 East/US-93 north.

item.title: US-93 North/US-26 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance Marker on US-93 North/US-26 East. Distance to Richfield, Carey, and Idaho Falls.

item.title: US-26 East/US-93 North - Shoshone
item.description: US-26 East/US-93 North in Shoshone

item.title: ID-75 North - Magic Reservoir West Side
item.description: ID-75 North at junction to Magic Reservoir - West Side. Magic Reservoir lies on the Big Wood River south of Sun Valley.

item.title: ID-75 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on ID-75 north. Distance to Bellevue, Hailey, and Sun Valley.

item.title: ID-75 North - Sawtooth Scenic Byway
item.description: ID-75 North - Sawtooth Scenic Byway. The Sawtooth Scenic Byway runs between Shoshone and Stanley along ID-75.

item.title: Begin ID-75 North at US-26/US-93
item.description: US-26/US-93 at ID-75 in Shoshone. Turn right for US-26 East/US-93 North to Arco and Idaho Falls. Continue straight for ID-75 to Sun Valley.

item.title: US-26 East at US-93
item.description: US-26 east at US-93 in downtown Shoshone. Turn right for US-93 south to Twin Falls; turn left for US-26 East/US-93 North to Idaho Falls (via US-20) and Sun Valley (via ID-75). US-26 joins US-93 northbound to Arco.

item.title: US-26 East at US-93
item.description: US-26 east at US-93 in downtown Shoshone. US-26 joins US-93 northbound to Arco.

item.title: US-26 East - Entering Lincoln County
item.description: Entering Lincoln County on US-26 east.

item.title: End ID-24 at US-93
item.description: End ID-24 West at US-93 Junction north to Sun Valley and south to Twin Falls.

item.title: Begin ID-75 North at US-26/US-93
item.description: US-26/US-93 at ID-75 Junction in

item.title: End ID-24 at US-93
item.description: End ID-24 at US-93 in Shoshone. Use US-93 north to Sun Valley; US-93 south to Twin Falls.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching US-26
item.description: US-26 Junction on US-93 North
